attributes.action: Change the oyster fare from Watford Junction, to be a numbered zone
attributes.additional_details:
It costs £7 on peak and £4.10 from Chesham to get to zone 1

But from Watford Junction it’s £10.50 on peak and £7.60 off peak to get to zone 1

So it costs £3.50 more to go from a station nearer London than from a station 15 miles away. This has got to change! Please sign and change this now!
attributes.background: We’d like to change the zone that Watford Junction is in to become a numbered zone where the fare is less. Rickmansworth, Croxley, Chesham and Others are further away from London than Watford Junction, and it is unfair that the oyster zone is significantly higher for that station.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for Transport for London and the Mayor of London. 

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
